results.name: mods for FNAF World and fnaf World simulator

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 7 (probably)
  • Processor: a working one of these
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: enough for a 2d game
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
  • Additional Notes: it's a 2d pixel art game, it doesn't need much to work.
